Atma and Psuedo walked off to guard the Maximals and Tarantulas. They sat
there with rifles and tried to stay awake. It wasn't hard, they were asleep
for a while before Blackarachnia's orders. ^ _ ^
----- Original Message -----
From: <JP3884@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, August 22, 2000 8:22 PM
Subject: Neo Beast Wars~


>     Black Aracnia emerged from the tank, as did Paralysis. Together they
> entered the bridge to find Atma and his patner playing with themselfs.
>     "You two, go and guard our new little addition to the family,
Tarantulas.
> And the Maximals too." she ordered, taking her place at the command
station.
> "Paralysis, tell Quickstrike to come here. I have a mission for him. I
want
> him, Venomus, and Solo to go to a disclosed location and retrive...well,
I'll
> have to tell him when he gets here with the others. Atma and Pursuedo will
> remain here with the rest of us in case of attack, but Aerostreak,
Grappler,
> and Guantix will be dispatched if aid is needed." She said.
>
> 
>
>
>
